etymology.description: 中(中) (zhōng, "middle"; "central") and 正(正) (zhèng, "upright"; "correct") form 中正(中正) (zhōngzhèng, "upright and central"), a name symbolizing balance and virtue in governance, often associated with nationalist leader Chiang Kai-shek. 區(區) (qū, "district") refers to an administrative division or region.
etymology.interpretation: 中正(中正) (zhōngzhèng, "upright and central") reflects an ideal of balanced and righteous governance, which aligns with themes in Chinese political philosophy. The district is named in honor of Chiang Kai-shek, underscoring the historical significance of these ideals. 中正區 is a district that embodies these values in contemporary Taiwan.

parts.english: upright; central; name honoring Chiang Kai-shek

examples.chinese: 我住在中正区(我住在中正區)。
中正区拥有丰富的历史(中正區擁有豐富的歷史)，并承载许多文化传承(並承載許多文化傳承)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngzhèng Qū yǒngyǒu fēngfù de lìshǐ, bìng chéngzài xǔduō wénhuà chuánchéng.
examples.english: Zhongzheng District boasts a rich history, and it carries many cultural heritages.

examples.chinese: 每逢假日，中正区的街道热闹非凡(每逢假日，中正區的街道熱鬧非凡)。
examples.pinyin: Měi féng jiàrì, Zhōngzhèng Qū de jiēdào rènào fēifán.
examples.english: On holidays, the streets of Zhongzheng District are bustling with life.
